dict.string: --Screenshot (type "S" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Nestopia" to activate delay 0.1 key down "S" delay 0.1 key up "S" end tell set pathToROM to do shell script "cat ~/.pathToROM" do shell script "cd ~/Desktop; for f in *.png; do mv \"$f\" " & pathToROM & "\"${f%%.000.png}\".png; done"
--Defrost (type "D" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Nestopia" to activate delay 0.1 key down "D" delay 0.1 key up "D" end tell
--Freeze (type "F" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Nestopia" to activate delay 0.1 key down "F" delay 0.1 key up "F" end tell

--Screenshot (type "S" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Boycott Advance" to activate delay 0.1 key down "S" delay 0.1 key up "S" end tell set pathToROM to do shell script "cat ~/.pathToROM" do shell script "cd ~/Desktop; for f in *.png; do mv \"$f\" " & pathToROM & "\"${f%%.000.png}\".png; done"
--Defrost (type "D" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Boycott Advance" to activate delay 0.1 key down "D" delay 0.1 key up "D" end tell
--Freeze (type "F" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Boycott Advance" to activate delay 0.1 key down "F" delay 0.1 key up "F" end tell

--Screenshot (type "S" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Sega Genesis" to activate delay 0.1 key down "S" delay 0.1 key up "S" end tell set pathToROM to do shell script "cat ~/.pathToROM" do shell script "cd ~/Desktop; for f in *.png; do mv \"$f\" " & pathToROM & "\"${f%%.000.png}\".png; done"
--Defrost (type "D" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Sega Genesis" to activate delay 0.1 key down "D" delay 0.1 key up "D" end tell
--Freeze (type "F" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Sega Genesis" to activate delay 0.1 key down "F" delay 0.1 key up "F" end tell

--Screenshot (type "S" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Mugrat" to activate delay 0.1 key down "S" delay 0.1 key up "S" end tell set pathToROM to do shell script "cat ~/.pathToROM" do shell script "cd ~/Desktop; for f in *.png; do mv \"$f\" " & pathToROM & "\"${f%%.000.png}\".png; done"
--Defrost (type "D" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Mugrat" to activate delay 0.1 key down "D" delay 0.1 key up "D" end tell
--Freeze (type "F" key) tell application "System Events" tell application "Mugrat" to activate delay 0.1 key down "F" delay 0.1 key up "F" end tell
